title: GBA (State Flags)
summary: God Bless America (GBA) is a watch face to show of your State Flags.
description: Want to be able to show off the colors of your state flag on your wrist.  Nows your chance with GBA (God Bless America) watch face, you can now either show your states flag true colors, or show them all or just a selection of them.All flags have been created to have a slight worn out/grunge feel to them.Once you have chosen your flag(s), you can then choose how you want to see the time, either select from Analog or Digital.Digital has several styles to choose from.12/24 hour display optionsColor of the Font optionsAll you need to do is select the flag, and your away, want a selection of flags, choose Random, and then select the flags you want, Update to the watch and your away again.Show your pride in your state(s).Designed for all watch face resolutions both Square and Round.If you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.Settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet.  There are no settings on the watch face directly.To install please refer to the Wear Support Page.https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6140435Is compatible with Android Wear 5+ devicesIf you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.
descriptionHTML:
Want to be able to show off the colors of your state flag on your wrist. Nows your chance with GBA (God Bless America) watch face, you can now either show your states flag true colors, or show them all or just a selection of them.

All flags have been created to have a slight worn out/grunge feel to them.
Once you have chosen your flag(s), you can then choose how you want to see the time, either select from Analog or Digital.
Digital has several styles to choose from.
12/24 hour display options
Color of the Font options

All you need to do is select the flag, and your away, want a selection of flags, choose Random, and then select the flags you want, Update to the watch and your away again.

Show your pride in your state(s).

Designed for all watch face resolutions both Square and Round.

If you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.

Settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet. There are no settings on the watch face directly.

To install please refer to the Wear Support Page.
https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6140435

Is compatible with Android Wear 5+ devices

If you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.
